snippet.title: Siralim 3 - monster taming RPG
snippet.description:
Siralim 3 is a mechanically deep, monster taming RPG. Summon and customize over 700 different creatures to fight for you as you battle your way through randomly generated dungeons. Find rare treasure and use it to craft new items, empower your creatures, learn new spells, and much more.

Siralim 3 never ends - there's an infinite amount of content for you to uncover! In fact, there's not even a level cap.

Get it for Windows, Mac, Linux, and SteamOS via Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/841770/Siralim_3/

You can also purchase Siralim 3 for Android (Google Play), iOS, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One!

Coming soon to Nintendo Switch!
